thread.title: AI software differentiates between extremist propaganda and news

title: AI software differentiates between extremist propaganda and news
text:
AI software differentiates between extremist propaganda and news 8:44am EST - 02:03 
The company behind an artificial intelligence algorithm designed to identify extremist videos says the programme could stop Islamic State video being uploaded to the internet. Stuart McDill reports.   
The company behind an artificial intelligence algorithm designed to identify extremist videos says the programme could stop Islamic State video being uploaded to the internet. Stuart McDill reports.  //reut.rs/2EUyS1T
